moves.description: Add comprehensive diagnostic logging to chat orchestration
moves.details: Enhanced logging in configureToolsEnhanced() and chat/route.ts to track exact tool flow: tool count loaded, tool schema validation results, and what gets passed to AI SDK. Added critical diagnostic warnings when no tools are passed to AI SDK.

moves.description: Investigate AI SDK tool integration in streamText call
moves.details: Check if tools are properly formatted and passed to streamText() in chat/route.ts. Verify toolsToUse object structure matches AI SDK expectations
Ensure that when AI tries to call a prefixed tool (e.g., 'fetch_fetch'), it correctly maps to the actual MCP tool execution pipeline

moves.description: Add tool schema validation before AI SDK integration
moves.details: Implement validation in tool-collection-manager.ts to catch any schema issues that could cause AI SDK to reject tools silently

moves.description: Surface tool loading errors to chat interface
moves.details: Add error handling to show users when tools fail to load rather than having assistant claim no tool access

moves.description: Test end-to-end tool execution from chat
moves.details: Create test conversation to verify assistant can see and use MCP tools, specifically the fetch tool mentioned in the original error
Ensure chat continues to work even when MCP tools are unavailable, with clear messaging about tool status
Confirm all 20 tools are accessible, assistant acknowledges tool availability, and error handling works correctly
